name: Kubernetes Ingress NGINX 最小
description: Ingress (nginx) の最小マニフェスト

files.template:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: {{name}}
spec:
  rules:
    - host: {{host}}
      http:
        paths:
          - path: /
            pathType: Prefix
            backend:
              service:
                name: {{name}}
                port:
                  number: 80
